issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Titanium SDK & CLI
components.description: Please enter tickets related to the MobileSDK here.

fields.description:
Hi,

In my project when I click on the image it still doesn't look the full image properly. we can still see the app in the background.Please advice me how to remove the app in a background.

Thanks,
hari

comments.body:
Hi Hariharan,

This JIRA site is not a dedicated support area. This site is reserved for filing Product Bugs and Features. If you are looking for help with a technical issue please try asking this in our community Q&A?(http://developer.appcelerator.com/questions/newest), Many of the top Titanium developers, Titans, and Appcelerator staff answer questions on the Q&A regularly.

Also you can check out our documentation which may be of some use to you: http://docs.appcelerator.com/titanium/latest/#!/guide/

Thanks,
Shak
